entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Pilot Mound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pilot Mound 3:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Temperature: -6.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -8.1°C
Wind: S 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Blowing snow early this evening. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
